manipulators.description: to_delayed_action is set to 300ms in karabiner.json
F triggers Obsidian when q_pressed is active
r triggers Obsidian when q_pressed is active
Caps Lock sets variable and triggers F16 when pressed alone (no mouse buttons)
Move to End of Document with Command+B
Move to Start Document with Command+B
Find in Page with Caps Lock+A
Move to Start of Document with Hyper+I
Move to End of Document with Hyper+K
Select to End of Document with Hyper+Shift+K
Select to Start of Document with Hyper+Shift+K
Select to Start of Document with Caps Lock+Shift+I
Select to End of Document with Caps Lock+Shift+K
Caps Lock -> Hyper Key (disabled when pressed alone)
This one shouldn't be used. Because it interferes.

rules.description: Both Command keys to f20 - so we can trigger the Wispr App (Whisper)

manipulators.description: Right Command to fn when left_command is pressed
Left Command + Comma to Left Mouse Button
Remap Backtick/Tilde to Tab in Vivaldi and Arc
Command+Shift+C to Command+Option+C in Finder and dialogs
Command+Shift+V to Command+Option+V in Finder and dialogs
Remap Backtick/Tilde to F2 (non-Vivaldi and non-Arc)
Right Command + Shift + I to Right Command + Option + I
Remap Escape to F16 in Vivaldi
Remap Escape to Command+K in Spotify
Type Double Quote with Both Shifts
Command + Shift + Quote to Double Quote
Remap Pipe to Closing Curly Brace
Find in Page with Caps Lock+A

rules.description: Caps Lock triggers menu bar search

manipulators.description: Launch Menu Bar Search with Caps Lock+A

rules.description: Vivaldi: Right Command + K to Control + F18
Command + Caps Lock triggers Command + Tab

manipulators.description: Launch VS Code with Option+F (hide others)

to.shell_command: open -a 'Windsurf.app' && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Windsurf" to set frontmost to true' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "h" using {command down, option down}'

open -a 'Obsidian.app' && osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Obsidian" to set frontmost to true' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "h" using {command down, option down}'

manipulators.description: Launch System Settings with Clean Background (Command+3)
Hide Other Apps and Open System Settings

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder" to click (menu item "Hide Others" of menu "Finder" of menu bar 1)' -e 'tell application "System Settings" to activate'

osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Finder" to click (menu item "Hide Others" of menu "Finder" of menu bar 1)' -e 'tell application "Arc" to activate'

rules.description: Arrows Highlight and Delete and Backspace

manipulators.description: Middle Mouse Button (Button3) with Command + Shift to Backspace
Shift+Open Bracket to Highlight and Delete to End of Line
Delete Forward by Word with Command+Open Bracket
Hyper + U to Scroll to Top
Hyper + O to Scroll to Bottom
Move by Word Left with Command+H
Move to Start of Line with Command+U
Select to Start of Line with Command+Shift+U
Move to End of Line with Command+O
Select to End of Line with Command+Shift+O
Move to Start of Document with Caps Lock+I
Select to Start of Document with Option+Shift+I
Move to Start of Paragraph with Option+I
Move to End of Paragraph with Option+K

Select to End of Paragraph with Option+K
Delete Line Below with Option+Open Bracket
Move by Word Right with Command+L
